Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements).
CAN: The student can accurately draw two people trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can clearly show a string telephone with cans at each end, correctly illustrating how it works using sound to send messages.
The student can include only the provided materials, such as cans and string, in their drawing of the string telephone.
The student can effectively illustrate how the sound travels through the string to send messages, possibly with arrows indicating sound direction.
The student can depict how the string telephone solves the problem of communicating over a distance, likely showing the distance clearly.
The student can model why this simple device is useful for communication over short or long distances, possibly by including exemplary labels or notes.
CANNOT: There may be minor gaps, such as incomplete labeling of materials or an inconsistent indication of sound direction with arrows, but these do not detract from the overall understanding.
